page.title: 16HOMELIFE IN BROUGHTY FERRY
page.content: 1Much of the life at home centres around mealtimes. Generally speaking, most families spend their day at work in the office, in the factory or at school. The main exception to this is the mother who stays at home to look after young children. {FOOD AND PREPARATION }The modern kitchen makes the preparation and storing of food a simple task. Cookers, fridges and freezers all help to make the task of cooking less time consuming. {HOME ENTERTAINMENT}The television plays an important role in family life. A large proportion of the evening is spent watching programmes tailored for all ages and interests. {PETS }Many families keep pets. Dogs, cats, budgies and tropical fish are popular.
